user.title: Welcome to Green Shift
user.description:
Green Shift combines **Artificial Intelligence** with **Gamification** to transform your energy usage.

Our AI learns your consumption habits to create personalized baselines, while daily challenges help you save energy in a fun interactive way.

Click **Next** to start your journey.

settings.title: Energy Configuration
settings.description: Please provide your local currency and current electricity cost per kWh to calculate savings.

working_hours.title: Define Your Schedule
working_hours.description: Select your typical working hours. This helps the AI understand when you're likely away from home, allowing it to provide more accurate insights and personalized energy-saving recommendations.

sensor_confirmation.title: Sensor Validation
sensor_confirmation.description: We found **{discovered_count}** compatible sensors. Please review the classification below to ensure calculation accuracy.

data_description.main_total_energy_sensor: If available, select the sensor that measures the TOTAL accumulated energy for the whole building. If not, leave this field empty.
data_description.main_total_power_sensor: If available, select the sensor measuring the TOTAL instantaneous power draw (Watts). If not, leave this field empty.
data_description.confirmed_energy: Select all sub-devices measuring kWh (e.g., washing machine, smart plugs).
data_description.confirmed_power: Select all sub-devices measuring instantaneous Watts.
data_description.confirmed_temp: Select sensors used to monitor indoor ambient temperature.
data_description.confirmed_hum: Select sensors used to monitor indoor relative humidity.
data_description.confirmed_lux: Select sensors used to measure light levels (Lux).
data_description.confirmed_occ: Binary sensors used to determine if a room is currently occupied.

area_assignment.title: Area Assignment
area_assignment.description:
Assign an area to each of the **{count}** sensors detected below.

Sensors left empty will be tracked globally without a specific room assignment, **but the AI will be unable to identify specific rooms wasting energy.**

intervention_info.title: Setup Complete
intervention_info.description:
Green Shift is now configured! 

**Note:** For the first 14 days, you will only see data consumption displays while the system learns your habits. 

Once the baseline phase is complete, **AI insights and Gamification** features will automatically unlock.

submit_task_feedback.name: Submit Task Feedback
submit_task_feedback.description: Provide feedback on task difficulty to help the AI adjust future challenges.

task_index.name: Task Index
task_index.description: The index of the task (0 = first task, 1 = second, 2 = third)

feedback.name: Feedback
feedback.description: Your feedback on the task difficulty

verify_tasks.name: Verify Tasks
verify_tasks.description: Manually trigger task verification for today's challenges.

regenerate_tasks.name: Regenerate Tasks
regenerate_tasks.description: Force regeneration of today's tasks (admin use only).

respond_to_selection.name: Respond to Notification
respond_to_selection.description: Accept or reject the notification currently selected in the dropdown.

force_ai_process.name: Force AI Processing
force_ai_process.description: Manually trigger AI model processing (for testing).

force_notification.name: Force Notification
force_notification.description: Bypass cooldowns and force a notification decision.

inject_test_data.name: Inject Test Data
inject_test_data.description: Generate synthetic historical data for testing. Note: 1 hour = 720 data points.

hours.name: Hours of Data
hours.description: How many hours of data to generate (1 hour = 720 readings)

set_test_indices.name: Set Test Indices
set_test_indices.description: Manually set AI indices (fatigue, behavior, anomaly) for testing.
